means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 布里姆 Bream的变体

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"边，边缘"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: edge, border, margin, rim, verge, brim, fringe
means: edge ： 普通用词，指较窄的边沿。
border ： 侧重刚好在界线内的一部分表面上，指较宽的边缘，也可指边缘本身。
margin ： 指物体的空白边，一般较宽。
rim ： 指圆形或有曲线的物体的边缘。
verge ： 指明显地标志一个表在或一广阔空间的边界，或终端线，也指极狭窄的空间。常用作比喻。
brim ： 指深容器的内边或河、湖等水域的最高线。
fringe ： 指地毯的须边、围巾的花边、烫发的卷边或人群的边缘。

word_mean: 骨盆上口，真骨盆入口缘

sentence.Network_en: The toilet was full to the brim with insects.
Richard filled her glass right up to the brim.
sentence.Network_cn: 理查德给她倒了满满一杯。

sentence.Network_en: The flowerbeds brim with a mixture of lilies and roses.
sentence.Network_cn: 花坛里长满了百合和玫瑰。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 博士英语词汇经典 - 豆丁网 ... bridge 桥, 船桥, 鼻梁, 桥牌 brim (杯, 碗等)边, 边缘, (河)边 brink (峭岸、崖的)边缘 371.
转载四个字母的英文单词 - 豆丁网 ... bowl n. 碗(状物),钵 brim n. 边缘,帽沿 brow n. 眉(毛)；额.
四级词汇表_百度文库 ... brilliant a. 光辉的；卓越的 brim n. 边，边缘；帽沿 brisk a. 活泼的；清新的.
Pelvic brim 盆骨缘 ; 骨盆上口  hat brim 帽边 brim stiffening 帽边挺硬加工  ly brim 结破冷断  posterior brim 后缘 cutting brim 尖锐 bcontest brim.

list.abs: 32. 下列何者与骨盆缘（ pelvic brim） 的构成无关？ (A)髂骨　 　 (B)耻骨　 　 (C)髂耻线　 (D)荐骨岬。
"brim"怎么说合适-翻译"brim"-可可查词 ... brim over 溢出; brim bonnet 有边帽; ly brim 结破冷断.
How to love the winter寒冬的乐趣 -... ... abound in 富于，盛产 brimming with 充满着，洋溢着 badger 獾.
横空 English,... ... 横眼 askance;from the side of the eye 横溢 to overflow;brimming with 横摺 horizontal fold or tuck.
My World: Zi dian 1 ... 使节 Envoy 洋溢 Brim with 深远 Profound and everlasting.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (denoting the edge of the sea or other body of water): perhaps related to German Brame 'trimming'

entry.def: The brim of a hat is the wide part that sticks outwards at the bottom.

example.ex: Rain dripped from the brim of his baseball cap.
example.tran: 雨水从他的棒球帽帽檐上滴落。

example.ex: ...a flat black hat with a wide brim.

entry.def: If someone or something is brimming with a particular quality, they are full of that quality.

example.ex: England are brimming with confidence after two straight wins in the tournament.
example.tran: 英格兰队在锦标赛中连赢两场后信心大增。

entry.def: When your eyes are brimming with tears, they are full of fluid because you are upset, although you are not actually crying.

example.ex: Michael looked at him imploringly, eyes brimming with tears.
example.tran: 迈克尔满怀乞求地看着他，两眼泪汪汪的。

entry.def: If something brims with particular things, it is packed full of them.

example.ex: The flowerbeds brim with a mixture of lilies and roses.
example.tran: 花坛里长满了百合和玫瑰。

entry.def: If something, especially a container, is filled to the brim or full to the brim with something, it is filled right up to the top.

example.ex: Richard filled her glass right up to the brim...
example.tran: 理查德给她倒了满满一杯。

example.ex: The toilet was full to the brim with insects.

entry.def: If you are full to the brim with a particular emotion, you feel that emotion so strongly that it is stronger than all other emotions.

example.ex: Her heart beat so fast and she was full to the brim with joy.

means.word_mean: 1. the top edge of a vessel
2. a circular projection that sticks outward from the crown of a hat
